alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany; Southern Livingston; Southwestern St. Tammany; St. James; St. John The Baptist; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 11:40AM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the lower 20s tonight and upper teens Tuesday night are expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Louisiana and southern Mississippi. * WHEN...From 10 PM Tuesday to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
